## Neon Glow (A Friendship Anthem)

(Verse 1)
Another Friday night, the kitchen light is low
We're gathered 'round the table, watchin' memories grow
Remember shaky starts, the awkward 'hello' days?
Now we finish every thought in a million different ways
We don't need fancy plans or a stage to shine upon
Just a simple, silly moment from dusk 'til early dawn.

(Pre-Chorus)
The beat is in our hearts, the rhythm's in our feet
When the world gets heavy, you're the melody so sweet
No mountain too high, no shadow too deep
It's the promises we made that we always keep.

(Chorus)
Oh, this **joy** is a bright, electric thing
It's the laughter that only your voice can bring
We're lit up like a billboard on a summer street
In this moment, nothing could ever feel more complete.
Yeah, we're dancin' in the **neon glow**
The kind of **friendship** that everybody knows
Hands up high, let the happy feeling flow!
This is our anthem, watch us go, go, go!

(Verse 2)
You held the flashlight when I was lost in the dark
Then we blew out the candles and made a brand new mark
We share the wins and losses, the big and the small
You always catch me before I even start to fall
It's not just the big adventures, though we've had a few
It's the knowing glance, the comfort, the honest truth in you.

(Bridge)
Years from now, when the seasons change their tune
I know we'll still be looking up at the same moon
'Cause this connection isn't fragile, it's solid gold
A story that forever deserves to be told.

(Outro)
Go, go, go! Yeah, watch us shine!
This feeling is yours, this feeling is mine.
(Fade out with repeated 'Neon Glow!')
